channel.title: CVE Feed for vivo -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for vivo -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-12483|2024-08-04T11:56:52.105Z -- vivo -- appstore
item.description: The appstore before 8.12.0.0 exposes some of its components, and the attacker can cause remote download and install apps through carefully constructed parameters.

item.title: CVE-2020-12485|2024-08-04T11:56:52.084Z -- vivo -- the%20frame%20touch%20module
item.description: The frame touch module does not make validity judgments on parameter lengths when processing specific parameters,which caused out of the boundary when memory access.The vulnerability eventually leads to a local DOS on the device.

item.title: CVE-2020-12488|2024-08-04T11:56:52.088Z -- vivo -- jovi%20smart%20scene
item.description: The attacker can access the sensitive information stored within the jovi Smart Scene module by entering carefully constructed commands without requesting permission.
